spec.description:
Prepare and customized OS and PGSQL 13 pre-deployment operations to have a successfull master for ERA.
Prerequisite : 
Disk image of Centos 7.9 with minimal install
Dhcp Network with Internet Access

attrs.script:
# 1 - OsConfiguration
#Disabled firewall Linux

#! /bin/bash -x


echo ""
echo "Postgres @@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@ : CONFIGURE SYSTEM"
echo ""

echo ""
echo "Postgres @@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@ : STOP FIREWALLD"
echo ""
systemctl stop firewalld
systemctl status firewalld


echo ""
echo "Postgres @@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@ : DISABLED SE LINUX"
echo ""
sudo sed -i 's/SELINUX=enforcing/SELINUX=permissive/g' /etc/selinux/config
setenforce 0
cat /etc/selinux/config

echo ""
echo "Postgres @@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@ : DISABLE SSH ACCESS ROOT"
echo ""
sudo sed -i 's/PermitRootLogin yes/PermitRootLogin no/g' /etc/ssh/sshd_config

echo ""
echo "Postgres @@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@ : CONFIGURED PAM.D"
echo ""
echo 'session    required   /lib64/security/pam_limits.so' >> /etc/pam.d/login



echo "Postgres @@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@ : CONFIGURE HOSTNAME"
hostnamectl set-hostname '@@{name}@@'
rm -rf /etc/hosts
echo -e '127.0.0.1       localhost localhost.localdomain localhost4 localhost4.localdomain4\n@@{address}@@  @@{name}@@  @@{name}@@.@@{MyDnsDomain}@@' >> /etc/hosts


exit

#Script 2 - OsPostGres Prereqs
#! /bin/bash -x

echo ""
echo "Postgres @@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@ : CONFIGURE SYSCTL RULE"
echo "recommanded nutanix value"
echo ""
echo 'vm.swappiness=0
vm.overcommit_memory = 1
vm.nr_hugepages=0
vm.dirty_background_ratio = 5
vm.dirty_ratio = 15
vm.dirty_expire_centisecs = 500
vm.dirty_writeback_centisecs=100' | sudo tee /etc/sysctl.d/97-pgsql-database-sysctl.conf
sudo sysctl -p /etc/sysctl.d/97-pgsql-database-sysctl.conf

echo 'net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects=0
net.ipv4.conf.eth0.accept_redirects=0' | sudo tee /etc/sysctl.d/96-disable-icmpv4.conf
sudo sysctl -p /etc/sysctl.d/96-disable-icmpv4.conf

echo 'net.ipv6.conf.all.disable_ipv6 = 1
net.ipv6.conf.default.disable_ipv6 = 1' | sudo tee /etc/sysctl.d/95-disable-ipv6.conf
sudo sysctl -p /etc/sysctl.d/95-disable-ipv6.conf


echo ""
echo "Postgres @@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@ : CONFIGURE SYSCTL RULE"
echo "recommanded value disk sector configuration"
echo ""
echo '
ACTION=="add|change", SUBSYSTEM=="block", RUN+="/bin/sh -c '/bin/echo 1024 > /sys%p/queue/max_sectors_kb'"'| sudo tee /etc/udev/rules.d/71-block-max-sectors.rules

exit

#Script 3 - PgsqlEraSpecificRpms
#! /bin/bash -x

echo ""
echo "Postgres @@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@ : INSTALL OS RPM"
echo ""

yum install net-tools -y
yum install epel-release -y
yum install centos-release-scl-rh -y
yum install iptables-services -y
yum install zlib-devel -y
yum install readline-devel -y
yum install sshpass -y
yum install unzip -y
yum install rsync -y
yum install zip -y
yum install wget -y
yum install python3 -y
yum install python3-pip -y
yum install nfs-utils -y
yum install lsof -y
yum install git -y
yum install make -y
yum install ncurses-devel -y

#postgresql compile
yum install gcc -y
yum install gcc-c++ -y
yum install make -y
yum install libxml2-devel -y
yum install openldap-devel -y
yum install readline-devel -y
yum install zlib-devel -y
yum install systemd-devel -y
yum install openssl-devel -y

 # for CentOS 7
 
echo ""
echo "Postgres @@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@ : INSTALL CUSTOMER RPM"
echo ""

#rsyslog
cd /etc/yum.repos.d/
wget http://rpms.adiscon.com/v8-stable/rsyslog.repo
yum install rsyslog -y

#I3T
yum install nc -y
yum install mlocate -y


exit

#Script 5 - OsOracleGroupsAndUsers

#! /bin/bash -x


echo ""
echo "Postgres @@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@ : GROUP CONFIGURATION"
echo ""

groupadd postgres
groupadd era



echo ""
echo "Postgres @@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@ : POSTGRES_USER_CONFIGURATION"
echo ""
useradd -u 1002 -g postgres -d /home/'@@{cred_postgres.username}@@' -s /bin/bash '@@{cred_postgres.username}@@'

echo "@@{cred_postgres.username}@@:@@{cred_postgres.secret}@@" | chpasswd
echo "#POSTGRES CONFIG SUDOERS" >> /etc/sudoers
echo "@@{cred_postgres.username}@@   ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL" >> /etc/sudoers

echo ""
echo "Postgres @@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@ : GROUP CONFIGURATION"
echo ""

echo '# .bashrc
# User specific aliases and functions
LC_ALL="en_US.UTF-8"
LC_CTYPE="en_US.UTF-8"
export LC_ALL
export LC_CTYPE
export PGHOST=localhost' | sudo tee /home/'@@{cred_postgres.username}@@'/.bashrc



echo ""
echo "Postgres @@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@ : ERA_USER_CONFIGURATION"
echo ""
useradd -u 1003 -g era -d  /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@' -s /bin/bash '@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'
echo "@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@":"Nutanix.1" | chpasswd
echo "#ERA CONFIG SUDOERS" >> /etc/sudoers
echo "@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@  ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL" >> /etc/sudoers

mkdir /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.ssh/
echo '@@{era_PublicKey}@@' >> /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.ssh/authorized_keys

chmod 700  /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.ssh
chmod 600 /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.ssh/authorized_keys
chown -R '@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@':'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@' /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.ssh

echo '# .bashrc
# User specific aliases and functions
LC_ALL="en_US.UTF-8"
LC_CTYPE="en_US.UTF-8"
export LC_ALL
export LC_CTYPE
export PGHOST=localhost' | sudo tee /home/'@@{cred_era_admin.username}@@'/.bashrc

exit

#! /bin/bash -x

#Create pgsql default directory

sudo su -c "mkdir -p /usr/pgsql-13"
sudo su -c "chown -R postgres:postgres /usr/pgsql-13"
sudo su -c "chmod -R 775 /usr/pgsql-13"



cd /tmp

wget https://ftp.postgresql.org/pub/source/v@@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@/postgresql-@@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@.tar.gz -P /tmp --no-check-certificate


sudo su -c 'tar -xvzf postgresql-@@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@.tar.gz'

cd /tmp/postgresql-@@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@
sudo su -c '/tmp/postgresql-@@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@/configure --prefix=/usr/pgsql-13 --with-openssl --with-ldap --with-systemd --with-libxml'
sudo su -c 'make'
sudo su -c 'make install'
sudo su -c 'make install-docs'
sudo su -c 'make install-world'

sudo su -c 'mkdir /usr/local/pgsql'
sudo su -c 'chown postgres:postgres /usr/local/pgsql'

exit

#!/bin/bash

cd /tmp
echo "State pre clean"
ls -l

rm -rf *
echo "State post clean"
ls -l

exit

#! /bin/bash -x
sudo mkdir /opt/postgres_exporter
sudo cd /opt/postgres_exporter 
sudo wget https://github.com/wrouesnel/postgres_exporter/releases/download/v0.8.0/postgres_exporter_v0.8.0_linux-amd64.tar.gz
sudo tar -xzvf postgres_exporter_v0.8.0_linux-amd64.tar.gz
cd postgres_exporter_v0.8.0_linux-amd64
sudo cp postgres_exporter /usr/local/bin
cd /opt/postgres_exporter



sudo echo 'DATA_SOURCE_NAME="postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/?sslmode=disable"' | sudo tee  /opt/postgres_exporter/postgres_exporter.env

sudo echo '[Unit]
Description=Prometheus exporter for Postgresql
Wants=network-online.target
After=network-online.target
[Service]
User=postgres
Group=postgres
WorkingDirectory=/opt/postgres_exporter
EnvironmentFile=/opt/postgres_exporter/postgres_exporter.env
ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/postgres_exporter --web.listen-address=:9187 --web.telemetry-path=/metrics --extend.query-path=/opt/postgres_exporter/metrics.yaml
Restart=always 
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target' | sudo tee  /etc/systemd/system/postgres_exporter.service

sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl start postgres_exporter
sudo systemctl enable postgres_exporter

exit

#! /bin/bash


sudo rpm -i https://github.com/cybertec-postgresql/pgwatch2/releases/download/v1.8.5/pgwatch2_v1.8.5-SNAPSHOT-b39dfdf_linux_64-bit.rpm
cd /etc/pgwatch2/webpy/ 
pip3 install --user --upgrade pip setuptools
pip3 install --user  -r /etc/pgwatch2/webpy/requirements_pg_metrics.txt

echo '
[Unit]
Description=Pgwatch2 Gathering Daemon
After=network-online.target
#After=postgresql@12-main.service

[Service]
User=pgwatch
Type=notify
ExecStart=/usr/bin/pgwatch2-daemon -c /etc/pgwatch2/config/instances.yaml -m /etc/pgwatch2/metrics/ --datastore=prometheus
Restart=on-failure
TimeoutStartSec=0

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target '| sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/pgwatch2.service

exit

#!/bin/bash

echo ""
echo "Postgres @@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@ : PGWATCH_USER_CONFIGURATION"
echo ""
useradd -u 1004 -d /home/'@@{cred_pgwatch.username}@@' -s /bin/bash '@@{cred_pgwatch.username}@@'
echo "@@{cred_pgwatch.username}@@:@@{cred_pgwatch.secret}@@" | chpasswd
echo "#PGWATCH CONFIG SUDOERS" >> /etc/sudoers
echo "@@{cred_pgwatch.username}@@  ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL" >> /etc/sudoers

echo '# .bashrc
# User specific aliases and functions
LC_ALL="en_US.UTF-8"
LC_CTYPE="en_US.UTF-8"
export LC_ALL
export LC_CTYPE
export PGHOST=localhost
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin:' | sudo tee /home/'@@{cred_pgwatch.username}@@'/.bashrc

exit 0

#! /bin/bash

wget https://github.com/prometheus/node_exporter/releases/download/v1.1.2/node_exporter-1.1.2.linux-amd64.tar.gz
sudo tar -xzf node_exporter-1.1.2.linux-amd64.tar.gz
sudo mv node_exporter-1.1.2.linux-amd64/node_exporter /usr/local/bin/

echo '
[Unit]
Description=Node Exporter
After=network.target
 
[Service]
User=node_exporter
Group=node_exporter
Type=simple
ExecStart=/usr/local/bin/node_exporter
 
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target' | sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/node_exporter.service


sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl start node_exporter
sudo systemctl status node_exporter
sudo systemctl enable node_exporter

exit

#!/bin/bash

echo ""
echo "Postgres @@{MyPgsqlVersion}@@ : NODE_EXPORTER_USER_CONFIGURATION"
echo ""
useradd -u 1005 -d /home/'@@{cred_node_exporter.username}@@' -s /bin/bash '@@{cred_node_exporter.username}@@'
echo "@@{cred_node_exporter.username}@@:@@{cred_node_exporter.secret}@@" | chpasswd
echo "#NODE_EXPORTER CONFIG SUDOERS" >> /etc/sudoers
echo "@@{cred_node_exporter.username}@@  ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL" >> /etc/sudoers

echo '# .bashrc
# User specific aliases and functions
LC_ALL="en_US.UTF-8"
LC_CTYPE="en_US.UTF-8"
export LC_ALL
export LC_CTYPE
export PGHOST=localhost
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin:' | sudo tee /home/'@@{cred_node_exporter.username}@@'/.bashrc

exit 0

#! /bin/bash

sudo systemctl enable chronyd
sudo systemctl enable pgwatch2.service

exit 0

action_list.description: Automatic Replacement Based On Customer Requirement

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash

sudo rm /etc/chrony.conf

echo '
# Initial chrony.conf Calm Automation Configuration
server @@{SrvNtp1}@@ iburst
server @@{SrvNtp2}@@ iburst


# Record the rate at which the system clock gains/losses time.
driftfile /var/lib/chrony/drift

# Allow the system clock to be stepped in the first three updates
# if its offset is larger than 1 second.
makestep 1.0 3

# Enable kernel synchronization of the real-time clock (RTC).
rtcsync

# Increase the minimum number of selectable sources required to adjust
# the system clock.
minsources 2

# Specify directory for log files.
logdir /var/log/chrony ' | sudo tee /etc/chrony.conf

sudo rm /etc/resolv.conf
echo '
# Initial resolv.conf Calm Automation Configuration
search @@{DnsSearchList}@@
nameserver @@{SrvDns1}@@
nameserver @@{SrvDns2}@@
' | sudo tee /etc/resolv.conf

exit 0

action_list.name: ReplaceNtpDns

spec.name: BP_PG13_7X_STD_SRC
